entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
